00117         bool RegisterState::update()
00118         {
00119         // Check for input, if escape pressed, exit
00120                 if (inputManager->getKey(SDLK_ESCAPE))
00121                 {
00122                     GameState *state = new LoginState();
00123                         game->changeState(state);
00124                         return true;
00125                 }
00126 
00127                 SDL_Delay(0);
00128 
00129                 return true;
00130         }
00131

00133     {
00134         interfaceManager->removeAllWindows();
00135     }
